title: Fundamentals of Underwater Deep Learning Image Processing: Experiment-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and smartphone usage experience
context.additional_context: Training program aimed at strengthening practical competencies in underwater environmental data processing and deep learning model optimization. VR simulations enable experiential learning even in limited technical environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of applying deep learning models in underwater image processing.
Learners can perform real-time image analysis simulations using low-power deep learning models in edge computing environments.
Learners can propose data processing optimization plans considering constraints of underwater sensor networks.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
